text:
Mobile Product Designer @ Blacklane - Berlin, Germany (VISA)

We’re a well-funded, fast growing startup that provides professional drivers to business travellers in more than 150 cities around the world.

You will have full creative freedom to define the look and feel of the Blacklane iOS and Android apps - one of the primary interfaces between us and our customers.

More info about the position: https://www2.blacklane.com/en/careers/mobile-product-designe...

If you’re interested, drop me a line at claudiu-vlad.ursache+hn@blacklane.com
